ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: I find that my weapon speed interrupts consistently, as does a well timed kick.  Lothaniel is right, bash and slam are great spell breakers for thos not duel
ygData.messageBody:
I find that my weapon speed interrupts consistently, as does a well timed
kick. Lothaniel is right, bash and slam are great spell breakers for thos
not duel wielding classes.

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.


> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:14 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> Bash allows you to interupt casting...which comes in really handy later
> on,
> i never use ick in certain dungeons, IE mistmoore....
>
> I highly advise using it as soon as you get it so you can max out its
> level....it really helps when you are fighting a bad ass mage and you
> interrupt half of their spells....
>
> Im not sure how slam works as i am a dark elf...i assume that its roughly
> the same thing, except that you dont need a sheild to use it...if you can
> interrurt someone's sepll swith slam then by all means use it.
>
> Lothaniel T'Kazz
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745
>

> > find
